titleStmt.title: Cheapsides triumphs, and Chyrones Crosses lamentation to the tune of The Building.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coules, at the vpper end of the Old Baily,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Right half of sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.

place.placeName: the vpper end of the Old Baily
